DOC.brief_summary: The study aim evaluate effect Litramine fecal fat excretion healthy subject , provide comprehensive robust clinical evidence mode action treatment obesity weight management dietary fat binding .
DOC.criteria: BMI 2030 kg/m2 Accustomed 3 main meals/day Commitment avoid use weight management product study Females ' agreement use appropriate birth control method active study period Selfreported regular bowel movement ( 12 time per day ) Subject declare write his/her consent participate , understand requirement study willing comply Known sensitivity ingredient device Diabetes mellitus ( type 1 2 ) History clinical sign endocrine disorder Clinically relevant excursion safety parameter Current use antidepressant Presence acute chronic gastrointestinal disease Uncontrolled hypertension ( 160/110 mm Hg ) Stenosis gastrointestinal tract Bariatric surgery Abdominal surgery within last 6 month prior enrollment History eat disorder bulimia , anorexia nervosa within past 12 month Other serious organ systemic disease cancer Any medication could influence gastrointestinal function Pregnancy nurse Any medication use product treatment obesity within 6 week prior enrolment History abuse drug , alcohol medication Presence factor ( ) , investigator 's judgment , preclude subject participation
